Hello from Hexlet Python is awesome Python is awesome  (Строка в файлах совпадает)
Python is awesome Python also is a snake  (Строка в файлах совпадает)
>>>file1>>>
Hello from Hexlet Python is awesome Python is awesome
Python is awesome Python also is a snake


Python is awesome Python also is a snake
